models.name: todo_list_tasks
models.description: Stores individual tasks for the Todo list application. This table contains all task information including title, completion status, and timestamps for creation and updates.

plainFields.name: is_completed
plainFields.description: Whether the task is completed or not.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated.
